text: Thank you to @CityofTampa emergency team. You are doing a great job helping people stay safe during #HurricaneIrma #Sayfie https://twitter.com/alerttampa/status/907058501230481408 QT @AlertTampa Our Emergency Ops crew is still going strong as #HurricaneIrma moves into @CityofTampa! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJaDW7LWsAABKOv.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJaDYM6XoAEznPv.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJaEKscX0AEZ9YP.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJaEN3eWsAABDJs.jpg
If really nasty here in #Miami & we aren't taking direct hit imagine what it will be like in #Naples #Ft.Myers #Sarasota #TampaBay #Sayfie
RT @FaceTheNation @marcorubio : "I am concerned about southwest Florida," ... "You can't hide from the water." http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJX3yMmWsAAfAom.jpg
Heidi & I are lifting up in prayer all of #Florida for their safety during #Irma.

Watch here @FEMA & @SBAsouthcentral Q & A: What resources are available for #SmallBiz owners impacted by #Harvey's destruction? http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/906958170211438592/pu/img/G7lpCjV4v4V9qocW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/906958170211438592/pu/vid/640x360/tT_Cug6sEtg0Y5jE.mp4

.@pbcgov not on original emergency declaration but facing evacuees from many counties,prisoners from #Monroe & ongoing storm damage #Sayfie
RT @CLINTHREED #TeamRubio #HurricaneIrma https://twitter.com/senrubiopress/status/906926714470764546
RT @BobBuckhorn Thank you Senator @marcorubio for calling to offer your support as @CityofTampa prepares for #HurricaneIrma. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJTGOEuVwAAfjpw.jpg

Reminder: for Texans in need of assistance here are some questions I discussed w @FEMA & @SBAsouthcentral last week http://bit.ly/2vNSInC https://twitter.com/sentedcruz/status/905906542167429120 QT @SenTedCruz ICYMI:Here's my Q & A video w @FEMA & @SBAsouthcentral for helpful information on how to deal with #Harvey aftermath http://bit.ly/2xezxYH

RT @CityofTampa Have a question about your #HurricaneIrma preparations? Call our @AlertTampa hotline from 8am-8pm at (844) 852-8889 and ask us! #TampaReady http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJOIfT6XoAA1XYW.jpg
RT @NWSMiami 9/10 820 PM Stay in safe shelter, we are still experiencing damaging wind gust across South Florida #FLwx
RT @FLSERT Do not go outside, even if the storm appears to have subsided #FLPrepares
RT @AlertTampa Need a ride to a shelter? @Uber is offering free rides to open @HillsboroughFL shelters with promo code: TBSHELTER
@CityofWestMiam1 Message for SW Fla & #TampaBay get ready & those who left S.Fla b/c of storm,if safe stay put,now is not the time to head back 3/3 #Sayfie
For @MiamiDadeCounty @BrowardCounty @pbcgov worst yet to come.Dodged center of #HurricaneIrma but very dangerous conditions all day. #Sayfie

#Florida could not be more grateful to @CustomsBorder and @CBPFlorida for #HurricaneIrma recovery. Thank you! https://twitter.com/goldberg/status/906929461634883584 QT @Goldberg Reinforcements on the way!!! @CustomsBorder Incident Commander DeFrancisci briefs .... http://tmi.me/1fjBbd http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJYPiVvVYAAlS8T.jpg
RT @PascoSheriff LIVE shelter capacity updates can be found at http://www.pascocountyfl.net by clicking on the “Hurricane Irma Shelters” icon.
Just got report @HialeahHospital has less than 2 hours of diesel left to run generator. They need diesel or @insideFPL restoration ASAP

To our friends in #Florida, please heed warnings from your local officials as #Irma approaches. https://twitter.com/nws/status/906968563679981568 QT @NWS #Irma has made landfall in FL at Marco Island.  Expect extreme winds moving into the Naples area and an imminent rise in sea levels. https://twitter.com/NHC_Atlantic/status/906966568617299969
.@monroecounty #FloridaKeys @City_of_KeyWest getting pummeled by #HurricaneIrma It will be a long 24 hours for the Keys. #Sayfie
If in #TampaBay evacuation zone & still debating whether should leave read this article on conditions in #Marathon http://www.miamiherald.com/news/weather/hurricane/article172401982.html

RT @netanyahu May everyone in the US emerge safe and sound from the hurricane. This storm, too, shall pass. Everyone in Israel is praying for your safety. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/906985283899490309/pu/img/Ng8npTUys2TyKgNR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/906985283899490309/pu/vid/240x240/qfxR6aD284MDpWO1.mp4

Discussed #HurricaneIrma on @FaceTheNation this morning. Keeping all of #Florida in my prayers as we weather the storm. Please be safe. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJYeR9NW4AAexbB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/906943294357286912/vid/1280x720/qaRFv1UZWEXh-B8Y.mp4
RT @FLSERT The #FL Emergency Information Line has been activated 24/7. For up-to-date information regarding #Irma please call 1-800-342-3557
At the @HoustonTexans game, with Challenger the bald eagle, who soared above the field-sized flag during the national anthem. #TexasStrong http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJYor8CUMAESGNN.jpg

Important Message: If you are from the #Florida Keys and trying to return, please wait. The Keys are not yet safe. https://twitter.com/monroecounty/status/906931845304082432 QT @monroecounty Monroe County is closed until further notice. Evacuated residents do not return until further notice. More info to come. #hurricaneirma
@CityofWestMiam1 9AM with @jaketapper 9:30 with @TODAYshow 10:30 with @FaceTheNation & 11:15 with @ThisWeekABC to discuss #HurricaneIrma #Florida #Sayfie 2/3
Getting reports of serious situation in @pbcgov Stonybrook Apt. Bldg. G. roof collapsed emergency evacuation of 67 residents #Sayfie
RT @NWSTampaBay A tornado watch has been issued for parts of Florida and Georgia until 12 AM EDT http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJX-eHeX0AEWB7d.jpg
The people of California are holding Floridians in our thoughts and prayers today.
On this A.M. from my now no-electric power home in @CityofWestMiam1 with most major networks shows. My message #BESMARTBESAFE! #Sayfie 1/3

RT @ThisWeekABC .@marcorubio on #Irma: "We've had bad storms, but never something this big, this dangerous, in these many places." http://abcn.ws/2gU0MRn http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJX2T7GVwAEmrMQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/906901650115137537/vid/1280x720/BWXgLQVhnPM8Kz5B.mp4

The #Florida Keys are still not safe. It is important you do NOT head towards the Keys yet. Standby for further guidance from officials. https://twitter.com/monroecounty/status/906931845304082432 QT @monroecounty Monroe County is closed until further notice. Evacuated residents do not return until further notice. More info to come. #hurricaneirma
RT @PinellasCoNews Know where to stay in your home when sheltering from a tornado. #PinellasIrma http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJYDYrFU8AAdxWv.jpg
Heidi and I are lifting up in prayer all in the path of #Irma. Please follow instructions of local officials and stay out of harm's way!
RT @LindseyFOX26 JUST FYI: #ParamountRx is distributing free Tetanus vaccines at the select H-E-B stores affected by #Harvey. @Fox26Houston
RT @MiamiHerald Hurricane Irma: Uber is offering free rides to Tampa shelters, but only for a while http://hrld.us/2xoTdZS http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJYRMyEWAAEyIXB.jpg
Saddened by loss of @HCsheriff Deputy Julie Ann Bridges & @FL_Corrections Sgt Joseph Ossman. We honor those working 24/7 to keep us safe.
Just on @ShepNewsTeam @FoxNews telling those who left #SouthFlorida b/c #HurricaneIrma now is NOT time to be on road headed back #Sayfie
